CustomField.description:
Optional character to use to separate the Base Title Tag from the Page Title Tag. In the example below the "<" character is used as the Title Tag Separator. Defaults to "|"
"My Custom Page Title Tag < My Base Title Tag"
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Optional character to use to separate the Base Title Tag from the Page Title Tag. In the example below the "<" character is used as the Title Tag Separator. Defaults to "|"
"My Custom Page Title Tag < My Base Title Tag"
CustomField.label: Title Tag Separator
